snippet: The Supreme Court was correct to rule that a farmer cannot reproduce patented seeds without permission of the patent-holder.
abstract: Editorial expresses support for Supreme Court ruling that farmers cannot reproduce patented seeds without permission of the patent-holder; cites details of case that pitted Indiana farmer Vernon Bowman against Monsanto.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court was correct to rule that a farmer cannot reproduce patented seeds without permission of the patent-holder.

headline.seo: Soybeans and the Spirit of Invention
headline.main: Soybeans and the Spirit of Invention
headline.print_headline: Soybeans and the Spirit of Invention
